about_the_game:
The world we once knew has collapsed... The explosion has fractured the temple into an ever-changing ruin. And our people? Melted away till their souls lay bare. The 'Core' is responsible. It lays at the very top. You must find your way there...

You will face endless opponents on your journey. Summon your allies to fight for you. As you ascend, you will gain opportunities to strengthen them. But be wary, exhaust your mana reserves and you will fall. It will take many attempts but we will see this through. Now... Arise Summoner!



Customize Units, Unlock Synergies:
Gain upgrades from defeating each wave of enemies. Each upgrade increases the mana cost of your units. So balance your needs accordingly. With hundreds of upgrades to pick from, discover cool synergies and turn your units into powerhouses!



3 Factions, Different Playstyles:
Play as one of the three summoners: Spectral, Infernal, Holy. Each faction has their own unique list of upgrades with a completely different playstyle!

Endless Levels:
Face off against unique combinations of enemies and bosses in a procedurally generated map. Ascend up the temple's 3 different locations. Encounters get harder and harder as you go! You may fail, but you can always try again. Every run will be a totally different experience than before.

name: Summoner Arise Demo
short_description: Turn-based. Tactics. Roguelike. Summon units and battle your way past wave after wave of enemies. Start with a fixed amount of mana as you ascend a mysterious ruined temple. Run out and you lose. With hundreds of upgrades available, customize and command your army to victory!
